item.title: Emacs Tramp
item.description: Tramp mode for sshing Emacs Tramp tricks C-x C-f /ssh:root@ssb.willschenk.com:/etc/host This command will ssh into it and now projects can be browsed into emacs as if it were right here on my local machine. C-x C-f also need not be done since I have bound it to Spc-Spc. C-x C-f /sudo::/etc/hosts : edit file as sudo Also has some tips for docker
